name: Recipe: Nod-Krai Hot Dog
desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making a Nod-Krai Hot Dog.

customize.text:
<color=#ffffff>Dish Effects</color>
Increases all party members' CRIT Rate by <color=#37ffff>6â€“12%</color> for 300s.
In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).
<color=#ffffff>Proficiency</color>
10
<color=#ffffff>Dishes</color>

customize.name: Nod-Krai Hot Dog
customize.desc: Classic convenience food. Put a sausage in some bread, sprinkle on some fried onions, a generous squirt of sauce... and there you go, a delicious, filling Nod-Krai Hot Dog!

customize.name: Delicious Nod-Krai Hot Dog
customize.desc: Classic convenience food. Freshly cooked sausage paired with freshly baked bread. With each bite, the irresistible aroma of fat fills the palate. It's gone in a few quick bites, leaving you craving another.

customize.name: Suspicious Nod-Krai Hot Dog
customize.desc: Classic convenience food. The sausage is too dry, while the bread is too soft, giving the unpleasant impression of chewing on a sponge... If not for hunger, it would be hard not to throw it away...

customize.name: Mora
customize.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

customize.name: Nod-Krai Hot Dog
customize.desc: Classic convenience food. Put a sausage in some bread, sprinkle on some fried onions, a generous squirt of sauce... and there you go, a delicious, filling Nod-Krai Hot Dog!

customize.name: Flour
customize.desc: A powder ground from wheat. No matter what it goes into, it brings a sense of satisfaction to the diner.

customize.name: Onion
customize.desc: A spherical vegetable. As vengeance for cutting it, it will make you cry, no matter how brave you are.

customize.name: Tomato
customize.desc: A bright red ingredient that gives a tangy kick. Yes, the "fruit or vegetable" debate is still going...

customize.name: Sausage
customize.desc: Finely minced meat wrapped in a skin. A staple of every meat lover's daily diet.
